main event: A UFO sighting reported on 7 July 1947, with the incident being unexplainable astronomically and suggested to possibly be a weather balloon.
interesting points: The sighting occurred near Muroc AAF in California, Multiple observations were made by military personnel, The object was described as circular and possibly oscillating due to warm air currents, A major pilot observed what initially appeared to be a parachute at a significant altitude, The evaluation by Dr. Hynek categorized the sighting as having no astronomical explanation.
sighted object: circular object believed to be 3 to 10 feet in diameter
witness description: Military personnel including a major and a test pilot
